The catalog is a collection of products: The catalog is a collection of products that you can share with your customers
The most important part of our platform: The most important part of our platform where you can add products in a way that increases the purchase and conversion rate.  When creating or editing a product, look at the advanced settings that will increase your sales.

When you share our platform's link with: When you share our platform's link with others, you will earn a 20% commission on any amount they top up. You will receive your commission in cash, not wallet balance.

Here you will find apps that you may nee: Here you will find apps that you may need to improve your store, increase sales, or perform specific functions that your store needs.

Integrate Meta Pixel to track conversion: Integrate Meta Pixel to track conversions from your Facebook Ads.
Share the platform's link with your refe: Share the platform's link with your referral code, and you will receive a lifetime 20% commission on any amount charged by the users you shared the platform with.
You can withdraw your commission to a ba: You can withdraw your commission to a bank account or Vodafone Cash by contacting support.
You will find the latest transactions yo: You will find the latest transactions you have made, such as top-ups or discounts.
This page displays your balance, due amo: This page displays your balance, due amount, and allows you to top up your wallet.
Your store will remain activated for lif: Your store will remain activated for life
No expiration date for the balance: No expiration date for the balance
Your current balance is the available am: Your current balance is the available amount in your account, and $0.04 is deducted for each order. If the balance runs out, the outstanding amount (debt) increases with each new order...
Ordify platform is now in partnership wi: Ordify platform is now in partnership with Top Media Buyers platform
You can now register an account on Top M: You can now register an account on Top Media Buyers platform and link your account with your store in EasyOrders
Submit your request now and the best mar: Submit your request now and the best marketers will contact you
You will find professional marketers and: You will find professional marketers and you can verify the number of orders they have achieved as we document and verify the number of orders achieved by each marketer. Create a free account on Top Media Buyer: Create a free account on Top Media Buyers and link it with your stores on EasyOrders to prove to project owners the number of documented orders and your marketing experience
The service is free and there are no com: The service is free and there are no commissions or expenses

Sale Price (Leave blank for no discount): Sale Price (Leave blank for no discount)
If the product has multiple properties s: If the product has multiple properties such as colors and sizes, the price for the variations must be changed because this price will not be effective.
The net profit gets calculated through t: The net profit gets calculated through this field
Controls the appearance of the section a: Controls the appearance of the section at the beginning, the higher the number, the more it appears before other products. For example, if this section has a priority of 9 and a section has a priority of 7, 9 will appear before 7.
Some marketers love these features and b: Some marketers love these features and believe they increase sales, and they do increase your sales, but we do not recommend some of these features, such as the fake visitors and fake discount counter, because the customer will confuse you with other marketers he has dealt with before and had bad experiences with. Imagine with me that a customer bought a product from another marketer who uses these features on his site, and the product arrived to the customer with problems and didn't work, and the marketer didn't refund the money or return the product. When he sees any store with these same distinctive marks, he will think it is the same person, so be careful when using these features. They may benefit you in the short term and increase sales, but in the long run, they will damage your reputation.
This option makes the customer skip the: This option makes the customer skip the cart adding process and buy the product directly.
Text written on the Buy Now button: Text written on the Buy Now button
Activate the Fixed Buy Button at the Bot: Activate the Fixed Buy Button at the Bottom of the Page
The Buy button will appear fixed at the: The Buy button will appear fixed at the bottom of the page as the customer moves around the page. We recommend activating it.
Purchase the product from the same page: Purchase the product from the same page
Make checkout form before product descri: Make checkout form before product description
The checkout form will appear before the: The checkout form will appear before the product description
This option makes reviews appear on the: This option makes reviews appear on the product page
Enable this option to show the customer: Enable this option to show the customer a fake number, such as 'Now 20 visitors' or 'Now 60 visitors'.
Minimum number of visitors currently vie: Minimum number of visitors currently viewing the page
Maximum number of visitors currently vie: Maximum number of visitors currently viewing the page
This feature displays a fake low stock,: This feature displays a fake low stock, such as 'Only 5 pieces left'.
This is the fake number that will be dis: This is the fake number that will be displayed to the customer, and don't worry if the customer makes a purchase, this number will decrease in front of him.
A fake timer that appears to the custome: A fake timer that appears to the customer telling them that there is only an hour left for the discount and counts down in seconds.
Number of hours in the fake timer: Number of hours in the fake timer
The product will be hidden and will not: The product will be hidden and will not appear in the store.
The quantity counter will be hidden.
Hide the header on the product page to d: Hide the header on the product page to display only the landing page.
Activate free shipping for the product: Activate free shipping for the product
Make shipping free for this product only: Make shipping free for this product only
The related products will be hidden on t: The related products will be hidden on this product's page
Price to send to the pixel: Price to send to the pixel
The price that will be sent to the pixel: The price that will be sent to the pixel, put low price to make pixel low cpa, or leave blank to send the default price.
this option will work in single product: this option will work in single product checkout and add to cart, it will not work in default checkout page.

If the product has multiple properties s: If the product has multiple properties such as colors and sizes, the quantity for the variations must be changed in variable product section and add stock for each variant, this quantity will not be effective.
